website_summaries.verdict: A quality hairbrush that is reliable for almost any type of hair and gentle enough to use on children and sensitive scalps, but not on wet hair.
pros: Consumers who love natural products will appreciate this hairbrush for its authentic bamboo handle and boar bristles
Works on long and short hair
cons: The bristles are somewhat short, but some users prefer this
Not the best choice for wet hair
Tends to make hair look "flat," others are better at creating volume

website_summaries.verdict: The most luxurious option on this list that contains 100% boar bristles and wood to delicately detangle.
pros: Combination of bristles and wood is great for untangling hair
Leaves strands feeling extra soft and shiny
Nice option for those with long, thick hair
Brush design is relatively easy to clean
cons: Not all users find it to be worth the investment

customer_reviews.title: My scalp has become one with the universe
customer_reviews.text: My hair. Such soft. Like. Wow. This brush. So good. So scrubby. Scalp happy. Hair shiny. My follicles were singing some kind of ethereal verse known only to those who have achieved nirvana after a thorough brushing with this brush. So enraptured was I with how stimulated my scalp was, and how soft my hair became, I couldn’t stop petting my head, attracting odd stares from my family, but they Know Not the Wonder that is a good brushing with this brush. It’s nice. Love yourself.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Budget-friendly boar bristle hair brush
customer_reviews.text: My fine hair needs a boar bristle hair brush to tame flyaways and redistribute the oil. I bought this as a replacement when a hotel maid mistakenly threw out my previous hairbrush (it arrived within 1 day). This functions well, but the handle isn't as comfortable to hold as I would like. However the Mason Pearson hairbrush I really wantedcosts about 10 times as much...My budget tells me to be happy with the hairbrush I now own. One year later: I am still happy with this brush. Is it the "best"? Probably not. However, as cheap as I am, this brush delivers the results I need.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush! I just received our second because my daughter kept using mine! I have think wavy hair that knots quickly and this brush gently brushes through and quick! My daughter has long fine hair and hates brushing her hair. But since she tried my brush last month she's been brushing her hair more and her hair look so much better! So glad we found this brush!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Maker

customer_reviews.title: ... it is not really that important to buy a good brush. I was wrong
customer_reviews.text: I always thought that any kind of brush will do the job and it is not really that important to buy a good brush. I was wrong! Now I can see the difference! This brush makes my hair very shiny and it looks clean for 1 or 2 more days. I tried few boar brushes and sent them all back but this one is great! I love it because it has bristles (most of them don't) and it can detangle my thick, long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Bazabib

customer_reviews.title: Great scalp stimulation
customer_reviews.text: This brush works very well to stimulate my scalp and freshen my hair without pulling or tugging at my hair. It detangles well. I only wash every 5 days, and this really makes my scalp and hair feel cleaner afterwards. It doesn't remove all the oil from my roots but I can tell it moves some of the oil down the shaft which keeps my hair from getting staticky or dry. I brush my hair out well every night, and it also helps make nice smooth ponytails.
customer_reviews.author: Stapayr8485

customer_reviews.title: A Good Investment
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brush. I’ve never gone with boar’s hair before and was nervous that it wouldn’t be a good choice for my thin dry hair. I use a wide tooth comb after a shower along with a smoothing serum and then this brush once my hair has dried - perfect combination. I have noticed a lot less breakage and hair in the brush itself. I also really like the wooden handle - very sturdy. I’ve snapped a few brushes in my day and that’s not a concern here :).
customer_reviews.author: TaylorD

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 years and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this brush for 2.5 years and it's still in great condition. I have thicker straight hair that doesn't tangle very much and it flies through my hair when I use it. It's a very sturdy and well-made. I really love this brush because it brushes my hair out so easily and it's comfortable in my hand. My only complaint - and I don't know if it's even an issue, but the boar bristles collect lint like nobody's business. I have to clean out the bristles regularly with a pick or comb, but I figure that it's taking the lint out my hair. It's a great brush and I'm still happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S. Yu

customer_reviews.title: No Static!
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of mixed brushes and they're ok, but because their base is plastic they build up static which is bad for hair. So I was looking for a good mixed brush with a wood or bamboo base and found this one. I've only used it twice so far so I can't comment on longevity, but I was hoping for no static build up and that's exactly what I got! This will now be my regular brush.
customer_reviews.author: WhoAmI?

customer_reviews.title: The best brush EVAAAAAAA
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick and coarse hair. Not only does this brush go through my hair better than my Mason Pearson brush, it scratches my scalp. It is heaven!!! I am in love with this brush. And the price! WHOOOP! I actually sit in front of my vanity brushing my hair like they did in the 40's or 50's. Package came on time and wrapped well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmarie

customer_reviews.title: The directions on the brush recommend using a comb or de tangling brush first
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nine year old daughter. She has straight, very long, medium thickness, all one length hair...this brush really makes her hair smooth and shiny. The directions on the brush recommend using a comb or de tangling brush first, to get knots out, and that is exactly what we did. Highly recommend this brush. My daughter calls it her “old fashioned” brush, I guess because of the wooden handle, and it is a bit bulky, but she loves it...I don’t have to nag her to brush her hair anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L Cline

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several boar bristle brushes recently from Amazon. This is the first to be a suitable replacement for the brush I used for 20 years before the handle broke. The density of the boar bristles is perfect. Not so thick they won't work my thick hair. Not so thin as to be worthless. The nylon bristles are the right length and are tipped so the are not sharp. I couldn't stand the brush that felt like I was cutting my scalp every time I used it. And the handle is just right. Time will tell if it lasts another 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria H

customer_reviews.title: Teeth flew out of the comb
customer_reviews.text: Very good brush! But! Two weeks after using the teeth flew out of the comb. I think a couple of months it will be bald.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey S.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEM- SMOOTH AND SHINY HAIR WAS MY RESULT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT ITEM - i was going to buy the very expensive Boar hair bristle brushes but this one got great reviews and I can see why. It does a great job ---just remember to dry your hair till it's almost completely dry, section it off and finish drying with this brush ---NOTE - THIS IS NOT A BRUSH TO USE ON WET HAIR --- it's meant to be used as a finishing product type thing - not every day brushing. If you use it on barely damp hair---it will result in smooth shiny hair
customer_reviews.author: Jodi- NOLA-PI

customer_reviews.title: It’s good for a few months only. Disappointing!! Won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this two stars because when it’s new it’s a good brush for long hair. This is the third one I’ve bought because after only a few months the bristles go down into the plastic that holds them. When it gets to that point I use it on my Australian Shepherds. I’d give it one star but for the use of 4 to 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: SuziOozi

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: Why did it take me so long to find this brush? The Boar Bristle Hair Brush from Beauty by Earth is fabulous for hair that tangles and breaks. I honestly saw the difference the first time I ran the brush through my hair. It tamed the frizzies and made me feel smooth and polished. I have been using it awhile now and my hair has developed a shine that I am thinking (no scientist here) comes from brushing the oil from my scalp through the hair. Love this brush!
customer_reviews.author: Keitha Brownell

customer_reviews.title: I really like this brush
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brush! When I opened it I was slightly set back by the size of the hard bristles. They are much smalled than my other brush so I thought they would be weak. NOT at all! This brush is quite stong. I love that it has bristles. I have a regular bristle brush but it's a pain to use since I have to split my hair up in different sections for the bristles to get through all my hair. But this brush gets through my hair Nd saves lots of time
customer_reviews.author: Claire L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: So far works great for the price. However, it is receiving only 4 stars because it did arrive with damaged bristles. Updated review: Absolutely wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Elina Romero

customer_reviews.title: Best brush for thick, fine, long hair
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, fine, long hair and have never been able to use boar bristle brushes until now. The design of the brush is boar bristle with longer tines interspersed. The longer tines grab the fine hair and coax down into the sender bristles to give a luxurious feeling when you pull the brush through your hair. Brushing my hair a hundred strokes is pure pleasure now! I will be buying one for my daughter who has similar hair to mine and recommending it to all my friends who have complained about their brushes as well!
customer_reviews.author: BellaSunder

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life!
customer_reviews.text: I have frizzy, poofy, curly hair. It is almost impossible to get a brush through my hair while wet without ripping out all of my hair. I took a shower and towel dried my hair then used the brush. It got all my knots out and the brush wasn’t filled with hair. A few, as expected, but just a couple. AND... it felt so good brushing my hair and scalp. I recommend this brush for sure. My son tried it and loved it so now I have to order another one for him. Mind you he’s 8 and hates his hair being brushed. That should tell you something. But this brush you will LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Tips fell off, painful to brush
customer_reviews.text: Rounded tips all fell off, brush just scrapes the scalp painfully now! I can’t believe this thing got such good reviews! Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: N. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: This brush has changed my life! I have thick course hair. Before this brush, I would spend significant time blowing out my hair... only to have it look like dry hay on the ends. After using this to “brush” my hair nightly for 2 weeks now, I can’t believe the difference! Not only can I go much longer between washes, my hair is now significantly softer and shinier and the dry ends are almost gone completely. I have no trouble getting the brush through my thick hair. Don’t pass this by. It’s truly a game changer and will take your hair to the next level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bristles keep coming off
customer_reviews.text: I needed to brush my wavy thick asian hair but the bristle keep coming off of the brush. Every time I try to remove some of the hair in the brush, the bristles just comes off. Also the bristles are not long enough that it doesn't massage the scalp so if you have thick hair, it might not work for you. constant losing of the bristles are the main problem with this brush. Finally decided to return it since I wasnt using it at all
customer_reviews.author: Junbug

customer_reviews.title: Not like the good ole days
customer_reviews.text: I have a boar's bristle brush that is round for drying my hair that I bought many years ago and really like. I wanted a flat brush for just brushing one's hair. This brush is okay, but is not 100% boar bristle. The bristles are rather short and shed like crazy. The brush did come with instructions on when and how to use as well as how to clean. If you don't have thick naturally curly hair this brush will probably work well for you.
customer_reviews.author: Di Mc

customer_reviews.title: Lacking Quality
customer_reviews.text: At first, I really liked this brush. It brushed through my hair with ease and smoothed it but it did give me static. The second day using it the boar bristles started falling out and I'm not talking about a stray bristle (which shouldn't have happened to begin with) I'm talking about 4-5 bristles just brushing and since my hair is shedding I have to clean my tools daily so cleaning this brush the bristles would just come out in my hand. The SECOND DAY of use. No thanks. Terrible quality. Waste of money. Too bad because I really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: KimberMcC

customer_reviews.title: Deception
customer_reviews.text: There's actually NO boar bristles in this brush. It's two kinds of plastic. That being said, it is still useful as a really good scalp massager. Brushing the head entirely leaves a feeling of total invigoration and then relaxation. I just wish it was good for hair as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Helena B.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality boat bristle brush
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this brush would be a little more thick than it is. I like to use this type of brush when I get bonded extensions because it doesn’t pull them out but this brush wouldn’t work for that. I think someone with thin hair would do well with this brush but thick hair don’t even bother. It hardl brushes my scalp which is sort of the point with a brush like this; to help bring the oils from the scalp to the dry brittle ends of my hair. It still works as a brush but not a high quality boar bristle brush.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS BRUSH!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 60, and have thick, wavy hair prone to tangling. This is the first brush I've EVER had that gets through ALL my hair without ripping too much out. I do wish it came with a cleaning tool. This is a quality brush at a great price and I highly recommend it. Note: My wife wrote this review -since it's her brush. She won't let me touch it. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Scully

customer_reviews.title: Amazing company
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this brush to arrive. It did come with many bristles bent (thanks amazon packaging) but I reached out to the company directly and they were so helpful. The brush looks to be amazing quality, good weight and nice solid feeling handle. Their customer service and quality of the brush gets five stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: Stevens family

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Bristles - Painful
customer_reviews.text: The part that covers the bristles is pointy. Some of the bristles are extremely sharp. Not the boar bristles, but the regular ones. I combed through my hair and got scrapes all over my scalp that caused discomfort for days.
customer_reviews.author: NOYB

customer_reviews.title: Feels Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a brush like this before and I am in love. I was not sure how well it would do for my hair as I have thin hair. But I am amazed. I did some research and from what I read, bristle hair brushes are good for thin hair. SO, I purchased this one. The bamboo handle is a wonderful addition. The brush is a perfect size and the quality is legit!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Reese

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have long, straight, thick hair, which is layered, so it gets tangled really easily. Truth be told, I've often foregone brushing it and just twirled it up a bun because the prospect of a long, painful combing session was too daunting. Now that I have this brush, I actually enjoy brushing my hair! I love how it detangles and also massages my scalp in a really nice way, without pulling out a lot of hair. I think I'll probably begin to see improvements in my hair as the oils are getting distributed better and less hair is getting yanked out.
customer_reviews.author: emt_rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush but doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: It was initially a good brush, although it feels more like scratching your head than massaging, however after 6 months of very light usage (short hair, using this brush once a day) the plastic endings started to came off. 11 months after the purchase all plastic endings disappeared and the brush simply hurts very much. Also hard to clean it as the bristle hair is very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Dorottya Vigh

customer_reviews.title: Love at First Brush
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this brush. It's my first brush with boar bristles. Works really well for my family's hair type. We have thick hair buy the individual strands are fine. Plastic brushes tend to cause a lot of fizzing. This brush has made our hair very soft and glides through tangles with no tugging. Wish I would have purchased years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Tink&Tula

customer_reviews.title: No Pain detangler
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how painful detangling my long fine straight hair was until I used this brush. I had just gotten used to it. This works out the tangles with no pain and gives a gentle message. I actually enjoy brushing my hair and do it more often. I think it has also improved my hair since it helps distribute some of the oils.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn

customer_reviews.title: Made in China! (╯°□°)╯( ┻━┻
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love the brand Beauty by earth this brush is huge disappointment. They are advertising their products to be all made in USA but this brush is made in China! WHY??? (╯°□°)╯( ┻━┻ It looks very cheap and has strong smell of "chinesium" ... sorry but I ain't happy at all....retuuuuuurn
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Softens your hair.
customer_reviews.text: This brush makes my hair very soft, also it doesn’t hurt to use it. I had many compliments on how my hair looks right after using this brush. Excellent product, I will be buying 2 more for my girls.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine Britt

customer_reviews.title: Best brush I’ve had by far.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best brush I have ever had in my life. It makes my hair feel like absolute silk. After brushing my hair I can run my fingers through and not get caught even once. It also feels really nice when you use it. But it does scratch my skin easily so be gentle with it. You don’t need much pressure at all to use it. With normal brushes you almost have to fight with your hair but this is a totally different story. I could go on and on about this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This new brush arrived from Amazon a day before I found the old one and now IT is my new favorite. My hair is straight
customer_reviews.text: I was upset when I lost my the boar bristle brush I had for 20 years! This new brush arrived from Amazon a day before I found the old one and now IT is my new favorite. My hair is straight, mid to long in length. I need a brush to detangle (without hurting me) while smoothing out my hair. I hate brushes with only plastic tines (?). This is a nicely balanced, strong brush that is easy to grip and attractive. I foresee using it forever.
customer_reviews.author: Austin_Born_Bred

customer_reviews.title: Invigorate your head
customer_reviews.text: It had been years since I bought myself a new brush, so I read LOTS of reviews and decided to try this one. SO glad I did! It is well made, the handle fits nicely in the hand, the bristles are securely fastened and the longer plastic ones apparently rake across in just the right way to invigorate the scalp and leave my head feeling quite alive. I had gotten used to an old brush and forgotten how lovely it is when the daily brushing makes you feel perked up and ready for adventure. I highly recommend this brush!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Fish

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tangled Hair
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of a detangling brush, and had just been using regular paddle brushes. I have long, thick, heavy hair that LOVES to get matted and needs brushed multiple times per day. This brush just glides through my hair. I'm getting a lot less breakage on my ends, and my scalp takes longer to look oily. Really reasonable price, and it seems like this brush will hold up for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush based all reviews. Here’s my take. It makes my hair shiny that’s a plus, 3 stars for that, other than that I’m not a huge fan. It makes my hair flyaway and frizzy, I don’t need anymore frizziness. I agree with other reviews that the handle is not the most comfortable. I may return it!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Fauls

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while... then broke
customer_reviews.text: I liked this brush when I first received it. Unfortunately, it wasn't very resilient. (I often had mine in my gym bag.) The little bumps on the ends of the bristles started to come off after about a year. Turns out that hairbrushes are more painful without those bumps there. I had to dispose of the brush and buy something totally different.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy J

customer_reviews.title: The last brush i'll need while i still have a full head of hair.
customer_reviews.text: Every mans hair is different of course. For mine, this brush is perfect. I'm 69 and still have hair up front. It is thinning quite a bit however. This brush feels so good when i brush it and doesn't pull any of my hair out. Feels good on my scalp as well. i shampoo my hair daily and kind of a clean freak so its perfect for me.. I keep my hair short and always have since being in the military and because so much easier to take care of. i recommend this brush for everyone who wants a quality brush for an economical price.
customer_reviews.author: bob t.

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: It's a great brush. I wish it was only boar bristles and didn't have plastic bristles in it with balls on top. However, the balls haven't come off--so I can't complain too much. I got this brush to reduce static electricity in my hair during the winter time. It has helped slightly, but not too much. I still recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, volumizing Brush
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush to straighten wavy and mildly frizzy hair, if left to air-dry. This brush is comfortable to hold and leaves the hair with a very smooth texture, while adding volume. Also, it doesn't get hot after blow-drying for 10 minutes. I highly recommend this brush!
customer_reviews.author: DeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Better hair!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brush. My hair is definitely softer and shinier since I’ve been using it. I actually like brushing my hair now! And the best part, I’ve had fewer split ends since using this brush. I’m that person that’ll sit once in a while and snip the split ends off. My time cutting split ends has significantly decreased!! Yay
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Seven

customer_reviews.title: Love this Brush
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin hair long hair and this brush seems to pull the natural oils from my scalp down to the damaged ends of my hair. I have seen positive results from using this brush on my hair. I like the fact that the bristles collect the natural oils and infuse them down the strands to repair the damaged hair caused by dryness. I can add a additional bit of Oil (i use Moroccan Oil) to thoroughly infuse the strands without having greasy spots in my hair. It is a nice tool, Certainly not for everyone, but works good on long, thin, damaged hair in its restoration.
customer_reviews.author: Aunty C!

customer_reviews.title: Not a magic brush
customer_reviews.text: This does not make my hair extremely shiny or loom anything like the before and after pictures of other reviewers. However, I think it does pull the oil from your skull to the ends of your hair. I use it at night and I do feel my hair is healthier and shinier since using it. I have curly hair and so when I do brush my hair with this brush my hair looks like a giant fuzz ball. But I think it helps to keep it looking healthier. You are not supposed to brush your hair with this brush when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brush - needs a hole
customer_reviews.text: Brush is very nice and goes through long thick hair well. (Wish it had a hole in it for hanging). I though all brushes had that. I did not notice that it did not when I ordered it. Otherwise a very well made brush that should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: I just received the same brush and brushed my hair. I swear, this is the best hairbrush I have ever used. It is easy to hold it got out all the tangles and it made my hair so smooth. I have thick curly hair and I was able to use this brush to style it. It looks great after I brushed it You cannot go wrong if you buy this brush. I ordered another one r for a friend. I cannot stress how great it is! It does everything it is advertised to do.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Fraud.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is not "green. " the wood smells of formaldehyde. The "boar" bristle are falling out and many are too long and coated with plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lobomd

customer_reviews.title: Backup for travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a travel back up brush for the expensive one I do not want to lose. The difference is , the nylon is what you feel on scalp, the boar bristles are shorter, more hair on brush, not a bad feel but the expensive one is more comfortable and gentle. I have colored hair and need to take extra care. Not bad for the price and a good starter for normal hair.
customer_reviews.author: Archangel

customer_reviews.title: Great hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: After trying several types and brands of hairbrushes, I finally found this one...and I love it. The brush is wonderful - the combination of bristles and boar hair is kind and gentle on hair, while untangling it without ripping and tearing. On that note, I think this is the third brush I have purchased (replacing old, aging ones) and I am still in love with how it feels and treats my hair. In addition, I ended up purchasing an additional one for my sister, who fell in love with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: The brush down to the scalp and through the long hair easily. Pictures added to show how easy it is
customer_reviews.text: Have very long healthy hair and this helps me keep it healthy. The brush down to the scalp and through the long hair easily. Pictures added to show how easy it is.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Painter

customer_reviews.title: What a brush!
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised, actually, that I am leaving a review for a brush, but that is how amazing this thing is!! I've learned, upon using this brush, just how much I've been missing in the hair-accessories department all my life. Seriously, this brush feels great and really does leave my frizzy hair smoother.
customer_reviews.author: 💞Strange💞

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for thick hair??
customer_reviews.text: I received my brush today. Unfortunately the nylon bristles are so long that the boars hair bristles don’t touch my hair. Completely wasted purchase for me. Maybe for people with thicker hair.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Detangler
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has the worst tangling hair right at the base of her neck. Her hair is exceedingly thick and long and she always had a great big knot of hair in the back by her neck. Since she got this brush her hair has not been tangled at all and she can brush right through all the tangles. She doesn't have to spend an hour a day trying to get the tangles out of her hair. This brush is a miracle worker. I would recommend it to anyone who has long thick hair that is prone to tangling.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Aldana

customer_reviews.title: This brush is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Despite having bought from Amazon for many years, this is my first review ever, that is how good this brush is! I have straight hair, but recently got body waves for faster styling during very busy times. As a consequence, my hair is naturally dryer and more prone to knots and I noticed that my old plastic brush was too harsh on my "new" hair, creating horrible split ends! Not good. Long story short, I bought this brush.. and it's amazing! I am in luuuv with this brush. It goes through my hair like a knife through soft butter and in literally 1 minute my hair is knot free and I've noticed much less damage. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CDSI

customer_reviews.title: Really like it, and helping the frizz stay in control
customer_reviews.text: I have medium to long hair that is naturally wavy. Most of the time a blow dry it straight. I live in extreme humid conditions so my hair tends to frizz a little. This brush helps the frizz. After I use it I just smooth my fingers through my hair to help it. Really like it, and helping the frizz stay in control.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: If you have dry ends but oily scalp...
customer_reviews.text: Great for long hair that is oily at the scalp and dry at the ends. It's definitely made my hair stronger and healthier. I don't need to wash my hair as often now that I've been using this brush too. I don't recommend using it on fresh washed hair - wait until the next day when you have some oils. Be gentle and take your time. The quality feels great and will last me years. I wash it now and then (when lint builds up) with warm water and gentle soap.
customer_reviews.author: Athena S.

customer_reviews.title: New favorite hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this hairbrush! The brush is stiff enough to get through my hair, but flexible so it hasn't once pulled or stabbed. Also, while I've never really cared for boar bristles becuase they always seemed ineffective, my hair has definitely felt healthier and softer since I've been using this brush! Even my husband has been using it. Honestly didn't expect to be this pleased with a hairbrush!
customer_reviews.author: Patton Pray

customer_reviews.title: When the brush arrived, several of the plastic bristles ...
customer_reviews.text: When the brush arrived, several of the plastic bristles were bent. I thought they would straighten out with a little use, but they haven't really. This brush is okay. It creates a lot of static when I brush my hair. I do think it distributes some of the oil from my scalp. My hair doesn't look as oily after a couple days without washing.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by the longevity
customer_reviews.text: At first, it feels great on your scalp and gets through thicker hair. It was pretty smashed down when I received (from being in the package) and hasn't really straightened out. So many of the plastic ends have come off at this point that we need to purchase a new brush. It didn't even last a year and I have similar brushes that I still use that are about 5 years old.
customer_reviews.author: CandR

customer_reviews.title: It's okay to brush all of my hair now!!
customer_reviews.text: Best brush ever!!! I have long hair that seems to always tangle... It hurts so much to brush it out that I will sometimes go days just throwing it up in a bun and only brush the front strands... This brush is a dream!!! I can get through all of the snarls and tangles on my super tender headed scalp without any problems or the hour it used to take me to get through brushing my hair!!!! Only brush I will ever own again!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Schneetz

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty sure this brush is going to change my hair
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure this brush is going to change my hair, in a positive way, long-term. I have thick hair and typically, boar hair brushes don't cut it. The longer plastic bristles make this brush useable for me and my hair has changed in just the two days I've been using it! THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: This brush is amazing. I don't have to put hair spray in my hair anymore, I just brush it, and it stays down with my natural oils. Does everything it's purported to. Love this. Going to buy another for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Smooths and detangles hair.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush. I’ve never used board bristle before but it has made a difference in my overall hair quality. It detangles and leaves my hairs feeling sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This brush has been the absolute best product I have purchased for my hair
customer_reviews.text: This brush has been the absolute best product I have purchased for my hair, now that I am nearing my 60's my gray hairs are hard to manage but not with this brush. My hair has become lustrous and softer and I can't believe what a difference it has made to daily routine. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: If you want to tear off your hair buy this brush
customer_reviews.text: Probably the worst brush I ever used. Used it twice, saw it it tears off my hair and threw in the garbage. Should of returning because the seller seemed really nice when they contacted me but I hadn't used it at that time. Your best best is to just go be a de-tangler brush from walmart. It tore off a bunch of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: lizzy26

customer_reviews.title: the wooden handle seems fine, but I do really care what kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: From the images, I expected more boar bristles within the brush, but each white prong only has a few spare bristles. I should have gone with a different brush. Otherwise, the wooden handle seems fine, but I do really care what kind of handle it has as long as it stays attached.
customer_reviews.author: diana sorsby

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Ouch! The plastic bits were falling apart, the tips coming apart. It hurt to use and I'm a longtime user of boar bristle brushes. Never have I used one so bad. At this price, I could have bought 3 or 4 quality brushes from Sally's Beauty. And this thing stinks too!
customer_reviews.author: dragonflygrl

customer_reviews.title: Hurts
customer_reviews.text: The nylon pins on this brush are not rounded but dipped in something and they come out pointy. My cheap $5 hairbrush managed to have rounded pins to massage the head instead of scrape against it. The boar bristles are not long enough to pull the oils from the base of the scalp. Not very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerR

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick, coarse hair. This brush gives my hair and insane amount of static. 2nd day and boar bristles are falling out. I have discontinued use. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: ReBecky

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic brush!
customer_reviews.text: I saw the reviews and knew it was one I had to have. It did not disappoint me at all. However, I did order several other Boar's Head brushes on Amazon and they were good too. My husband especially likes this brush because it fits his huge hand (he is 6 ft 5 in tall so you can get the idea. He loves this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Carpe Diem Gal

customer_reviews.title: Lasts about 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in mid-2016 and a few months ago the bristles started to come loose and the black dome that holds the bristles started to come apart from the wood. For an 18 dollar brush to last 3 years, at 6 dollars a year--not bad.
customer_reviews.author: dao

customer_reviews.title: He didn't think he needed a new brush but was immediately impressed by how easy it is on his hair and scalp hile still ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband after noticing the old brush he was using was way past its prime. He didn't think he needed a new brush but was immediately impressed by how easy it is on his hair and scalp hile still getting through the tangles. ON days when I want my hair to be smooth rather than curly I use it and it realy does feel nice on my scalp!
customer_reviews.author: M. Natosi

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush, healthy looking hair
customer_reviews.text: Bought this brush to help with shedding hair post partum. It’s a nice brush and really helps. Only complaint is that some of the boar bristles were loose and fell out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazed

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent brush worth the money. I have never had one that worked this well. It detangles my hair without pulling it (wet or dry). It effortlessly brushes through my hair, distributing the natural oils throughout. I purchased a second one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Samaniego

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: It's a good brush. Looks proper and in no way cheap. Dropped one star because the spikes are a little too sharp and less comfortable compared to my other brushes and sometimes I feel it's scratching my scalp
customer_reviews.author: 3DReview

customer_reviews.title: The best brush for long hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this Brush. My hair tangles easily and brushing my hair out feels really smooth after using the Boar Bristle Brush. Typically using any brush or comb will pull my hair and I have tried a variety of them. Boar Bristle Brush not only detangles my hair but it does not hurt pulling my hair!! When I say I love this brush, I really mean I absolutely love this brush. I highly recommend the Boar Bristle Hair Brush!
customer_reviews.author: Mashuu

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Brat brush I ever used. After first use I knew I had been using wrong brush al my life. I have color treated hair and style daily. My hair was breaking on ends. This brush is gentle and also noticed a shine and change in texture! Love It!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Catzva

customer_reviews.title: The plastic bristles fall out
customer_reviews.text: I liked this brush initially, but the bristles fall out when I try to clean hair out of the brush. Cannot recommend at this price because it s not going to last very long
customer_reviews.author: CLS

customer_reviews.title: Quality brush, not the easiest to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love the brush and the bristles but it seems like tiny bits of fuzz build up SO easy on the tips of the bristles, more than any other brush I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to control frizz- I see no difference
customer_reviews.text: The bristles don’t look perfect, some longer than the rest. I mainly got it to control frizz and I honestly see ko difference!
customer_reviews.author: Adrita Iman

customer_reviews.title: About to order a second one for DD
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush. DD discovered mine last night and exclaimed it was the best brush she had ever used. I’m about to order one for her Christmas stocking before she steals mine!
customer_reviews.author: dollydanger

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the bristles on this brush really get the tangles out of mine and my daughter's long thick hair, after brushing it feels silky and smooth. My daughter loves it because it helps to get that just out of the shower smoothness, and I love it to help keep some of the frizzies down that I get around my face. All told a wonderful product that I will recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: robyn

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful brush. Very high quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful brush. Very high quality for the price. The last brush I bought was over $50.00 and it lasted me for 3 years. The back of it cracked it and it fell apart (the last one I got was a different brand). This one is light yet feels very solid and is great for my waist length hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H

customer_reviews.title: I like the addition of the nylon-tipped bristles in this brush
customer_reviews.text: I like the addition of the nylon-tipped bristles in this brush. It's really easy for the brush to grab and untangle my hair. With traditional boar bristle brushes, I always felt like it wasn't picking up all my hair. I like the simple wooden style, but I wish the handle was slightly more ergonomic and comfortable to hold. I've also noticed a lot of bristle shedding when trying to clean the brush out. Overall though, it's a good brush for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AKR1984

customer_reviews.title: Buy this brush!
customer_reviews.text: Wow buy this brush! I noticed a difference the first time I used it!! My hair looks healthier, shinier and I did not need to add a shine or fly away tamer afterwards, like I normally do after my blow-out.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Lang

customer_reviews.title: Great for thick hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have really thick, wavy, long hair and I love this brush. The detangling bristles are gentle but just long enough and firm enough to get through my hair and massage my scalp, while the boar bristles condition my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Berry-Huff

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: I have thick but fine hair, so I was looking for a brush that can get through the bountiful hair all the way to the scalp. But I did not want it to break my very fine hair or tear it out. This brush does an excellent job. I recommend it highly. Love the wood (Bamboo) handle,also.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: New and Damaged Bristles
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this product, upon opening the package I noticed several of the bristles were damaged, new and damaged?
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on curly frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use, but did not help my frizz at all. The directions said do not use on wet hair. I can’t use a brush on my curly hair dry, it would cause too much breakage. Not worth the price. Overpriced!
customer_reviews.author: Hello1111

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates frizz!
customer_reviews.text: My stylist suggested this brush because I have very thick, frizzy hair. I flat iron my hair every day, which isn’t healthy for it. So I bought this and LOVE LOVE it!! It makes my hair so smooth and when the frizz comes back because of the heat, I use this instead of a flat iron-and it works!! It also feels really good on your scalp!! I plan on buying this again for my daughters!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Attardi

customer_reviews.title: Love the brush but it smells like rubber
customer_reviews.text: Love the brush but it smells like rubber, which is not what I want my hair to smell like! I tried soaking it in mild soap and hot water but it didn't help. The smell is fading the longer I have it so I think it's going to be ok. It does a great job getting through my thick, mid back lenght hair. All in all I like it and think it will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: lovely locks
customer_reviews.text: perfect for daily maintenance of long thick hair. Does not pull or tug and great for evenly distributing oils and keeping your hair beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Fay Jung

customer_reviews.title: Adds control and shine
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush. I have wavy hair that tends to frizz easily in the summer humidity. This brush calms the frizzies and adds some shine to my hair. Its very gentle on my scalp and hair.
customer_reviews.author: WVMaryB

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This brush is a disappointment. The plastic extensions in the brush that were capped by black bubbles have already started coming off. I haven't even used it for a month yet. I would NOT recommend purchasing this brush to my friends. I definitely won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Lovely brush, but how to clean it ?
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice brush, does a great job going through my hair. The little plastic ends on some of the bristles are rounded, probably to protect the scalp. That also means that one cannot run a comb through the bristles in order to clean & shampoo it....even with a wide-toothed comb. Hmmm.
customer_reviews.author: Kumquat

customer_reviews.title: Great hair brush
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair brush. I was looking for a hairbrush whose bristles actually reach my scalp. This brush fits the bill. The handle feels good in the hand, the bristles perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Brush

product_meta.title: Boar Bristle Hair Brush - Hair Brushes for Women & Mens Hair Brush, Best Detangling Brush, Boar Bristle Brush, Wooden Hair Brush, Curly Hair Brush, Hair Detangler Boar Brush, Bamboo Hair Brush Kids
feature_bullets: HOW TO REPAIR YOUR DRY HAIR: This boar bristle hairbrush is more than just a hair brush - it's a 100% natural conditioning treatment to make your hair smooth, shiny, and looking it's best.

SAVE TIME AND MONEY ON STYLING PRODUCTS: When you use our eco friendly Bamboo hair brush your hair becomes healthier and softer. You’ll no longer need to use leave-in conditioners or expensive, oily hair serums.

FIND OUT WHY this is one of the best hairbrushes for women, and the #1 choice as a hairbrush for men. After just 7 days of using a boar brush, the most noticeable difference you'll see is an improvement in your hair texture

YOUR HAIR AT IT'S BEST - Using a boar bristle brush won't change your hair type, but it will simply make your hair more manageable and easier to style because it will deeply condition each strand of hair.

LOVE YOUR NEW HAIR OR LET US KNOW: this brush comes with a 100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee. If you don’t love your new look, just send it back and we'll give you a full refund - no awkward questions required.
